house_listing.house_description: Wonderful views of the water at rudee inlet. Lovely pool, security, marvelous landscaping. Furniture & furnishings may be available, possibly a boat slip too. A very nice waterfront condominium community.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.cooling: Air Conditioning, Heat Pump, Window/Wall Unit(s)

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Contemporary Style, Microwave
